lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it seems like it. He's got spellbooks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then he could still use your body to cast magic.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think Beau's got the right idea.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think Beau has the right idea as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I still cast Zone of Truth?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you could cast it with the rest of us.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, let me get the dome up, please.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we do it away and you go pick up the ruby and bring it here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think so, I think we get away, in case he draws any sort of power from the center.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interestingly enough, for his age, no scars.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's the chest? I want to open the shirt and take a look at the chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chest appears to be intact.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does wax, yeah, it's pretty smooth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty polished, the heart is beating.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How old does he appear to be? And is he a human?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll pull some of the manacles out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know how to respond to that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They used it on us when they kept us from doing spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, although before I do, I just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, talking to a super genius ancient powerful mage, I'll be great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is she trying to find out, before we do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How to get out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: We can step out of the dome and do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whenever. She's going to be right next to the dome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be just on the other side of the glass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord can literally stand half in and half out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Two-Face) What do you got, motherfucker? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the dome is completed, you all step inside except for Beauregard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I keep outside of it too, because I have to cast Zone of Truth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll give you one last Guidance for the roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really stand half in and half out, in the spirit of tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, different, I'm going to give you Resistance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give you Resistance instead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get a d4 to a saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll Mage Hand and drag the ruby over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ruby is lifted up and then brought over by the hand, the cloth you had thrown over it, Caleb, is still draped over it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Zone of Truth over the ruby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if it has to make a charisma save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is what it's all about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (exciting breathing) I haven't been this in-game nervous in a long time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is just the barest pale blue so that we see where the border is, but we can see everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember this thing is for magic users, so he probably wants you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can put her down pretty easily if we have to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to roll with my robot hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (unsure sound) What's your spell DC?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know whether the creature succeeds or fails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Beau won't be able to lie.

lines.text: We can move outside of the zone now, if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'll move outside of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I want to leave it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move outside of the zone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because it didn't work on him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm happy to see that you have not "abandoned the conversation."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I promise you riches, boons, whatever you need, "should you be willing to dispel this gem of imprisonment "that I have found myself in."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then what would you do? Where would you go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have seen, I assume, to have gotten this far, "what I'm capable of creating."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened? Why aren't you in your body anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A rare moment of "a lack of foresight "and care on my part."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who was the person that sabotaged you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have any idea how long you been in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With the time dilation, I have been unable to adjust, "as I've been stuck in here, so I assume it's still set "in the rapid progress, I believe?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How long have you been inside these halls, then?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A couple weeks? "Much time has passed on your-- "I assume you hail from Exandria, yes?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You may not be aware, but a lot of time is passing "in your home plane."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But then here I've been, and I guess the rest "you already know, since you look at me "with such a already well-informed expression."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like the red and the gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Halas, can you hold for one second?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He promised us riches and any boons that we wanted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you say about two weeks for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he was asking how long we've been in here, and then he's like, "Oh, you know, a lot of time has passed "between this time and the next," and I was like, "Yeah, I already know that."

lines.text: Did you ask him what the symbols on the roof are for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I haven't gotten that far yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said he wanted a little Dispel Magic.

lines.text: That's what he said, right? Dispel, he's like dispel this?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why he can't actually possess anybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, yeah, well he said one of his lackeys or colleagues sabotaged the gem.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not currently holding the gem, I assume.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he's pretty cool and stuff, but that was a pretty dumb move, is all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do the symbols do, how do we get out of here, how would we dispel it?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if he's only thing that--

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: I don't know, do you want to know how long you've been in here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The year is (whispering) what year is it?

lines.text: I believe by this time it would be 836 PD.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, based on the fact that we are now working "through time in a different eon than I am familiar with--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not knowing what PD refers to, and 800-- "Wow. It has been--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I set him down really quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I set him down really quick. He said no.

lines.text: Ask him how to change bodies permanently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, because we're very kind and giving people.

lines.text: "You seem to be very curious folk."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, that, you know, it sounds a little ominous, when you put it like that, you do realize that, right? Like, nothing about what you just said is trustworthy.

lines.text: Stay on target, stay on target, come on.

lines.text: We were just trying to get somebody out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and now we're trying to get out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm working on it! You jumped my line, man. I was working on my pitch.

lines.text: I can only hear your half of the conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have no idea what's going on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to get out, we want to get out, everyone wants to get out, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a fly on my head?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or be friends, I don't know. Do you want to be friends? Do you like friends?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you nice? Do you cry?

lines.text: Ask him if he's sad right now.

lines.text: "Then we could be useful to each other."

lines.text: We need an ally, we need to make friends.

lines.text: Most people don't really like necromancy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently, time isn't relevant, right, Halas?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can see all that through this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For every person you've lost, what if it was unnecessary? "What if there was a way to shrug off these confines "of expected mortality that might have worked "by the designs of some inferior, self-imposed deities? "Would you not be curious enough to pursue that possibility?"

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But when you focus intently on specific ideas, "sometimes you lose track of the small details, "a mistake I will not make again."

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're actually sitting in silence quite a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I kind of feel, as they say, the devil is in the details, and if you are messing with things that are necromantic in nature that maybe you wouldn't want to be clumsy, as you were, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you a spell user, a spell crafter, "a weaver of things arcane?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, what do you think? You've said you can sense a lot about me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you find your friends healing your wounds, "pulling you from the brink of death "and watching all of your cuts and hemorrhages reversed?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I get the point you're making.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To judge one thing based on its school "shows, how do you say in the common tongue, "ignorance."

lines.text: How do we get out of here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what war were you talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "There's conflict all across the world at many times."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These things do not concern me, I was more focused "on building my own abode."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, one of your little Betrayer God experiments, the Laughing Hand, does that ring a bell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, that was connected with "the unique sort of "divine mutation that I was researching."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, well, he's kind of stomping around the world right now wreaking havoc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I care not for this Laughing Hand."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What use is it to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So I would seek other means of prolonging one's life "without having to give in to such base, "easy transitions, such as lichdom "or means of undeath, "and the whole deal is messy, and difficult to control, and--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not altering time outside of this vicinity, "but the things that are shackled to the tower machine "can be transitioned to move slower or quicker "relative to the Prime Material Plane and others."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, we're going to continue to have this conversation, but I want to get out of this room because it's fucking boring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I assume that, seeing as how you are here, "you walked into the mouth of the dreadnought, and "I will say, quite impressive or extremely stupid, "either way, you are within the dreadnought's donjon."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I may have a means of "showing you out, "if you agree to take the gem and my body with you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll take the gem and your body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Round up his body, he's going to guide us out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He wants us to let him out, and I tell him all of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you exchange information with the party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He sounds really nice, I like him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he never explained to you exactly how we're going to release his body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's an ongoing conversation, but I don't want to really like end up saying something or piss the guy off when he's agreed to guide us out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, the truth of the matter is, you know, if it wasn't illegal or anything when he was around, you know, then maybe he didn't know it was bad, and really, is it bad if it's not hurting anyone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't like that he called you ignorant, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For a guy who seems so steadfast in his knowledge and confident in his abilities, I seem to rile him up pretty quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know, I know, but this one's different, this one's different.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we're inside the belly of a dreadnought that we can only escape through a Plane Shift spell, which Caleb, you cannot do, correct?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The best I could do would be to Banish one of you away to a random spot in our world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I could do it. No, no, no, Banish, we could cast it at a higher level, and I could Banish multiple people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the plane that they are from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, so if we banished multiples, everyone might end up in different places.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or in the ocean, or 500 feet in the air, or--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well look, I mean, he's offering to guide us out, I mean, we can try and just get to the door of this place and then decide from there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From within there he's going to explain it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can just walk us through it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to throw him back in his body until he tells us how to get out of here, so no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's three requests just for this, I feel like that's fair, and then for that, we'll put him back where he should be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would be fools to take him at his word on anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's better to have somebody's word broken than to have no word at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sort of empathize with him, you know, he wants to be out of this thing he's in, he wants his life back, he wants--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Possibly, we could talk to Allura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I can call her again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe she can get us out of here, and if she can't, then we're fucked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or she could just give us insight on if appeasing him is a bad idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's give her a call.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just leave him on hold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has it been 24 hours since the first time that I used it? Technically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically I've used it three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's been probably about, past the cusp of 24 hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I can use it again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry, did I wake you up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you talk faster, it'll be more normal for her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, if I-- oh yeah, okay, Allura, (quickly) so here's the deal, we went into the mouth of a dreadnought, and it turns out that it opened this other plane or something and now we're stuck in this thing, and we found the body of Halas, but he's trapped in a little ruby, and he's asking to be let out, and he seems sad about the fact that he's been trapped for so long, but everyone's unsure whether or not we should do it, and then we're like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we were like, "oh, you know, "maybe Allura can help us, she might know how to get out, "because you have to be able to shift planes or something."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be right there, one more second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you went into a dreadnought's belly."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would not know how to get there "to even attempt to get you out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you'd have to like come into the, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you're certain that he's trapped within this gem?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said he was in, what is it called?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He thought it was a jar, a magic jar, but it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But then they said it was someone sabotaged him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tricked him! And he got stuck in it instead.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, like the Control Person or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just manipulate, or at least to not give "too much information and get--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, we are so good at manipulating people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we aren't like that at all with you because we really like you and you're cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would like to see this gem."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well no, I'm not going to hold it up, I'm going to put it down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I put the mirror over the gem, go whoa.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I flip it to the other side, to the back side.
